mapper.select: select count(*) from event where title like %#{search}% or content like %#{search}%
mapper.insert: insert into Event (Title, Content, startDate, endDate, link) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{link})
mapper.update: update event set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, link = #{link}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate} where code = #{code};
